title: Portal UX Agent -- A Plug-and-Play Engine for Rendering UIs from Natural Language Specifications
summary: The rapid appearance of large language models (LLMs) has led to systems that turn natural-language intent into real user interfaces (UIs). Free-form code generation maximizes expressiveness but often hurts reliability, security, and design-system compliance. In contrast, fully static UIs are easy to govern but lack adaptability.
